701453f-a.title: Bronx: Melville Street - Van Nest Avenue
701453f-a.text:
Melville Street, east of Van Nest Avenue, showing the pedestrian bridge across the New York, New Haven and Hartford Railroad tracks.
The view is eastward.
April 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
701453f-a.folder: Melville Street & Van Nest Avenue, Bronx, NY
